summary: Iteration 81: i18n Rollout Testing - Language switching works correctly (EN/ES/ZH). Main admin dashboard and module content translates well. Bottom navigation fully translates. Minor issues found with some hardcoded Spanish strings in public store and section headers.

action_items: Add i18n translations to admin sidebar navigation (AdminSidebar.jsx or similar)
Add i18n translations for landing page 'Club Activity' section title/subtitle
Add i18n translations for public store page (search placeholder, subtitle, product status labels, add button)
ACTION_LABELS in RolesModule.jsx lines 32-39 have hardcoded Spanish - should use t() function
critical_code_review_comments: RolesModule.jsx: ACTION_LABELS object (lines 32-39) has hardcoded Spanish strings like 'Rol Creado', 'Rol Actualizado' instead of using t() function
Admin sidebar navigation not using i18n - menu items like 'Dashboard', 'Wallet', 'Users' remain in English
Landing page ClubActivity section may have hardcoded Spanish titles
Public store page components need i18n integration for dynamic labels

success_rate.frontend: 85% (major i18n flows work, minor gaps in sidebar nav and some sections)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 81 validated the i18n rollout. Language switching works correctly with flag-based selector (EN/ES/ZH). Main admin modules (Dashboard, Wallet, Roles) translate well. Bottom navigation fully translates on mobile. Key gaps: (1) Admin sidebar navigation remains in English, (2) Landing page 'Club Activity' section has hardcoded Spanish, (3) Public store page has multiple hardcoded Spanish strings (search, subtitle, buttons). The RolesModule.jsx ACTION_LABELS object needs t() function calls. Overall i18n coverage is ~85%+.
